item.simplelook.name: SimpleLook
config.simplelook.title: SimpleLook Configuration
config.simplelook.enabled.tooltip: Enable or disable the free look feature
config.simplelook.maxYaw.tooltip: Maximum horizontal angle you can look (in degrees). Set to 180 for full range.
config.simplelook.maxPitch.tooltip: Maximum vertical angle you can look up/down (in degrees).
config.simplelook.returnSpeed.tooltip: How fast the camera returns to center when you release the key. Higher = faster (1-100).
config.simplelook.smoothing.tooltip: How smooth the camera movement feels. Lower values = faster turning. Higher values = smoother but slower response (0-100).
config.simplelook.toggleMode.tooltip: If enabled, press once to activate free look, press again to deactivate. If disabled, hold the key.
